hard-questions_key2: Two times a number, decreased by 12 equals three times the number, decreased by 15. Which is the number?     a) 2     b) 3     c) 7     d) 9
hard-questions_key3: Twice a number equals 5 times the same number plus 18. Which is the number?     a) -3     b) -4     c) -9     d) -6
hard-questions_key4: If a + b = 29 , b + c = 45, a + c = 44. Find a + b + c =? a) 56 b) 54 c) 59 d) 23
